title: Everyone thinks that Jennie is the favored member in blackpink, but how come no one talks about how Lisa is favored so much more than Jennie ever was? BTW I am not hating on Lisa I just want to see if anyone also notices. - Quora

response.answer_text: Honestly I wonder the same. The amount of promotions and favor Lisa has been receiving lately is much more than Jennie ever did but I obviously don't want her to receive hate. Poor Jennie still receives hate for the long gone favoring. But people like to justify YG favoring Lisa by saying that she worked hard and got so popular and only then YG started favoring her. But duh! Favoring is still favoring. Also, even her huge fanbase don't mind this but all of them would rightfully bash Jennie if she gets favored. The double standards you see. I hope YG stops doing this, they all are just 4 members, they all deserve better and equal treatment.

Idk… it was obvious how many blinks were extremely mad at YG for having a fav member in their groups. YG was constantly attacked by blinks demanding equal treatment for all members especially Lisa. To me it seems like YG is giving Lisa more promos and stuff just to shut us blinks up. Like we already YG, it feels they're trying to tell us “Look see! Equality for all members!”… ut was only after yg kept getting attacked that they gave lisa more things. But idk… that's just how I see it😕

Well, she does get paid less than the other members so she is not really favored by the company that much. They only promote her more than Rose and Jisoo because she’s globally popular. Not to mention she is a rapper, which are kinda favored by YG. She also brings lots of attention to YG and Blackpink, so it makes sense if they promote her.

ANSWER IS NO. She is promoted because of her popularity. And Jennie is also promoted. So what? Solo stans just hated on her for getting rap and more lines(especially Jenestters). It was very wrong. -Her clothes…see-       And now Jennie’s clothes(not blaming/hating her)      I HOPE YOU CAN EASILY FIND JENNIE. RIGHT?  She cares about all of them. Please stop hating this baby. NO HATE TO ANYONE
